title: By the King, a proclamation for making currant His Majesties farthings & half-pence of copper and forbidding all others to be used
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the 16th day of August, in the 24th year of our reign, 1672."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
